name: Biosphere
desc: An onboard closed ecosystem used to grow assorted flora and fauna, and provide necessities for long-term journeys. Reduces externally-sourced supply consumption to near-zero.

name: Cloning Vats
desc: Installs a delicate system of sealed cellular vats used in fast-maturation human cloning. Produces green crew at regular intervals.

name: Nanobot Fabricators
desc: Allows for the remote instruction of nanoscale robots, used in an industrial-scale parts fabrication and assembly factory. Produces supplies at regular intervals.

name: Logistical Drone Control
desc: Provides mechanical assistance with near-range interfleet supply transfers, and eases the storage and organization requirements associated with large fleet logistics operations.

name: Naeran Flux Shunts
desc: Ancient Naeran technology that provides all Nomad ships with a way to dissipate flux internally by converting it into multi-spectrum EM radiation. Required for basic functioning of Nomad weapon systems, and not compatible with modern ships or technology due to its outdated design.
